alert.note: Alert for Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 12 at 2:44PM AKST until November 15 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Breaking waves of will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 9 AM Monday to midnight AKST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated water levels 2 to 4 feet above the normal high tide line are expected. Peak water levels will occur Monday night and Tuesday. Sustained southwest winds 20 to 30 mph developing Monday will shift to the west on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property. Items on the beach should be moved to higher ground to prevent damage or being washed away.
